labels.label:
To add a connector group: 
- Create a process group with the desired connector router and relations.
- Add a Get<connector> processor which, upon success, routes to the Synchronize Output output port.
- In the ConnectorGroupRouter processor in the level above, add a new property for the connector group
  (e.g. WebConnectorGroup with value Web) and create a connection to the new connector group
  process group.
- Make sure all failures are routed to the UnregisterDocument processor.
